#BlackMagicCraft #Episode121

In this video I challenged myself by doing a speedy project with a strict timeline and a strict set of constraints. I created a custom green dragon miniature from a cheap dollar store toy and I only used materials available from dollar stores in the process. It turned out pretty.....OK
